quiz.question: Which metric indicates the cost to reach one thousand impressions?
Which approach helps align creative messaging with customer emotions?
Which analytic method quantifies causal impact when randomized tests aren't feasible?
Which scheduling technique spreads ad impressions evenly over time?
Which model estimates the incremental effect of marketing channels using historical data?
Which advanced analytics practice improves targeting by reducing label bias?
options: Using propensity and uplift models instead of raw conversions
Relying only on historical conversion labels
quiz.answer: Using propensity and uplift models instead of raw conversions

quiz.question: Which common campaign objective focuses on getting a sale or signup?
Which KPI is most relevant for brand awareness campaigns?
Which advanced KPI estimates discounted future profits from a customer cohort?
What is the first step in planning a marketing campaign?
What does 'lookalike audience' targeting use?
options: Data from existing customers to find similar prospects
quiz.answer: Data from existing customers to find similar prospects

quiz.question: Which channel-level measurement suffers most from cookie depreciation?
options: Cross-site behavioral tracking for display ads
quiz.answer: Cross-site behavioral tracking for display ads

quiz.question: Which simple A/B test compares two versions of an email subject line?
What does 'brand lift study' typically measure?
options: Impact of advertising on brand metrics like awareness
quiz.answer: Impact of advertising on brand metrics like awareness

quiz.question: Which method estimates media synergy effects between channels in planning?
options: Cross-channel interaction terms in MMM or experiments
quiz.answer: Cross-channel interaction terms in MMM or experiments
